Name: Hula Hula, Houla Houla or Hoola-Hoola
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge speared with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with Ppneapple wedge on rim speared with a cherry.
Review: Gin and juice - orange with a splash of orange liqueur.
History: First published, spelt Houla-Houla , in Robert Vermeire's 1922 Cocktails How to Mix Them with the notation, " This drink originates from Hawaii ".
Nutrition: One serving of Hula Hula, Houla Houla or Hoola-Hoola contains 177 calories
